title.narrative: Humanitarian Assistance to Dam Collapse in Attapeu

description.narrative: Australian Humanitarian Assistance is to support the Lao Government's response to the flooding in July 2018 in Attapeu. This support includes 1) provision of relief supplies that meet the need of the affected people such as family tents, community tents, dignity kits for women and girls, mosquito nets, street solar lights, tent solar lights, tools kits, and birthing kits 2) support for early recovery focusing on education, nutrition, protection, and UXO clearance to support the affected communities through UNICEF, WFP, UNDP and NGO consortium (CARE, Save the Children, and Plan International). This support will provide safe learning spaces, teaching and learning materials and access to basic nutritious food to ensure that the children are able to resume their education and have access to nutritious food and help clear UXO in the affected areas to ensure the displaced people have safe land for their livelihood.
